title: Constructivist Social Education Design Based on Reinforcement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: A customized social education program for learners in managerial/leadership roles, providing interactive learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can understand the basic principles of reinforcement learning and explain its applicability to instructional design.
Learners can design social studies education scenarios using a constructivist approach.
Learners can implement a learner-customized feedback system using digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
